title: I would like to challenge the game developers to a formal tournament.
body:
Could we book Spokane arena and have a League of Legends match between me with the old Fiora and the game Developers with the new Fiora?

I have a team and you have a team. 

Let's do this!

Winner gets to keep the Fiora they played permanently in the game.

replies.body: Seriously, someone enlighten me. I legitimately cannot tell whether these are troll posts or actually delusional.
This guy has been posting spam like this for way too long.

> [{quoted}](name=Tyrone Lannister,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ALZRAOBk,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-06-20T00:10:00.080+0000)
>
> This guy has been posting spam like this for way too long.

Exactly how is a grand tournament to shape the future of the game...  "Spam"?
This past month alone you have 19 threads about the same topic which can be summarised into 1 discussion. How is that not spam?
Again, delete Feedora from the game and remove her lore altogether.
Normally, I would consider their posts troll, but seeing as they put so much effort into it, I would have to wonder what are they trying to prove.
Don't try to make sense of them. Just downvote and don't post.

Dude stop.

I'm sorry if the old Fiora's play style is more fun the the new Fiora's playstyle for you.

But with her old playstyle was completely unfair for the game  being completely pick or ban. 

You are not the only Fiora Player. She's actually the most picked top laner rn at 16.9% pick rate(Source:https://na.op.gg/champion/fiora/statistics/top)
Plenty of people like the new Fiora.Im sorry you dont feel the same.
If you are fighting her and you are bad at the game.

Old fiora was specifically changed due to how feast or famine she was. I'll take Riot's word over yours.

In other words, no counterplay ult on the old one. c:

Am I the only one reading this and going, "Does this guy even know what a tournament is?"
I mean seriously dude. A tournament is teams (more than 2) going at it, so using "tournament" for a single match is silly on your part.
It's a match to see if all the LCS players can beat me with the old Fiora after that.  Then I will beat all the top teams of the last 5 years.

I want the LeBlanc rework reverted and its been like 8 months but i dont go spam posting about it
Fiora was reworked multiple years ago and you do

Does Riot even still have the code for old Fiora? If not, how would they even get the old Fiora again? It would take time--they'd have to create a new champion, basically. I highly doubt they would do it anyway.
You have to give this guy some credit, this is some high complex thinking :/.

If I win you have to bring back the old Fiora as a new champ and we get to have both the New and Old Fiora. 

It's an entirely different champ anyway.  I don't see the harm in it. 

If you win... I quit posting about how you nerfed my champ to be mean in the message boards. 

Seems fair.

If you actually like your game don't you want to play it with me?  

Common!  Let's play!

Let's do a tournament! 

In the spirit of competitive gaming!
